creator: Kentaro Tsurumoto
descriptionHtml:
Chat Memo is a chat-like memo application perfect for talking to yourself.
Only you can see it, and you can write memos as if you were mumbling.

You can immediately jot down what you are thinking or feeling at that moment.
The sophisticated, colorful, and beautiful design further enriches your memo experience.

Chat Memo is a great tool to tweet as much as you want!

【Features of ChatMemo.】
■ You can take a memo as soon as you open the application.
As soon as you open the application, you can immediately write what you are thinking at that moment.
You can write memos as if you were tweeting in chat mode.

■ You can summarize your memos with the comment function.
You can add comments to the memos you have recorded.
When you want to add something to a memo, you can summarize it by adding a comment.

■ You can categorize memos with the tag function.
You can classify memos by adding tags to memos.
It is convenient to set tags for things that impressed you, things that frustrated you, private notes, work notes, and so on, so that you can look back on them later.

■ Password function included
With the password function, no one can see your memos.
You can write secret memos as much as you like.

■ Calendar function
Memos can be viewed on a calendar.
You can also set up tags for your private and professional life, etc.

■ No one can see your notes
Your notes are recorded only on your smartphone, so no one can see them.
You can't write anything because you are worried about someone else, as is the case with social networking services.
With this app, you can freely write your true feelings about what made you happy, what made you dissatisfied, what made you worried, and what made you happy.

■ Colorful and beautiful design
ChatMemo has a colorful and beautiful design for writing memos.
The theme colors are abundant and include light and dark colors, so you will be able to find the color that you like.

【ChatMemo is recommended for the following people.】
Those who want to take notes casually.
Those who want to tweet about things that are difficult to say on SNS.
Those who want to enjoy their own SNS.
People who want to take notes on their travel or private photos.
descriptionShort: Record notes anytime, anywhere with easy operation! you can take notes as tweet.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for always using Chat Memo!
This time, I made the app icon a pastel color gradation.
Thank you for your continued support!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for using our service!
We have made this update.

・Hide ads when you watch a video.
・Fixed some translations.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for choosing us! This time we have updated this.
・ You can now set the timestamp to be hidden (you can change it from the basic settings on My Page)

descriptionHtml:

Only you can see it, and you can write memos as if you were mumbling.

You can immediately jot down what you are thinking or feeling at that moment.
The sophisticated, colorful, and beautiful design further enriches your memo experience.

Chat Memo is a great tool to tweet as much as you want!

【Features of ChatMemo.】
■ You can take a memo as soon as you open the application.
As soon as you open the application, you can immediately write what you are thinking at that moment.
You can write memos as if you were tweeting in chat mode.

■ You can summarize your memos with the comment function.
You can add comments to the memos you have recorded.
When you want to add something to a memo, you can summarize it by adding a comment.

■ You can categorize memos with the tag function.
You can classify memos by adding tags to memos.
It is convenient to set tags for things that impressed you, things that frustrated you, private notes, work notes, and so on, so that you can look back on them later.

■ Password function included
With the password function, no one can see your memos.
You can write secret memos as much as you like.

■ Calendar function
Memos can be viewed on a calendar.
You can also set up tags for your private and professional life, etc.

■ No one can see your notes
Your notes are recorded only on your smartphone, so no one can see them.
You can't write anything because you are worried about someone else, as is the case with social networking services.
With this app, you can freely write your true feelings about what made you happy, what made you dissatisfied, what made you worried, and what made you happy.

■ Colorful and beautiful design
ChatMemo has a colorful and beautiful design for writing memos.
The theme colors are abundant and include light and dark colors, so you will be able to find the color that you like.

【ChatMemo is recommended for the following people.】
Those who want to take notes casually.
Those who want to tweet about things that are difficult to say on SNS.
Those who want to enjoy their own SNS.
People who want to take notes on their travel or private photos.
descriptionShort: Record notes anytime, anywhere with easy operation! you can take notes as tweet.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for using it all the time! This time we have updated this.
・Fixed so that the memo you are inputting will be retained even if you close the screen when posting a new post (it will be saved until you kill the app)
・Fixed other minor bugs

descriptionHtml:
Chat Memo is a chat-like memo application perfect for talking to yourself.
Only you can see it, and you can write memos as if you were mumbling.

You can immediately jot down what you are thinking or feeling at that moment.
The sophisticated, colorful, and beautiful design further enriches your memo experience.

Chat Memo is a great tool to tweet as much as you want!

【Features of ChatMemo.】
■ You can take a memo as soon as you open the application.
As soon as you open the application, you can immediately write what you are thinking at that moment.
You can write memos as if you were tweeting in chat mode.

■ You can summarize your memos with the comment function.
You can add comments to the memos you have recorded.
When you want to add something to a memo, you can summarize it by adding a comment.

■ You can categorize memos with the tag function.
You can classify memos by adding tags to memos.
It is convenient to set tags for things that impressed you, things that frustrated you, private notes, work notes, and so on, so that you can look back on them later.

■ Password function included
With the password function, no one can see your memos.
You can write secret memos as much as you like.

■ Calendar function
Memos can be viewed on a calendar.
You can also set up tags for your private and professional life, etc.

■ No one can see your notes
Your notes are recorded only on your smartphone, so no one can see them.
You can't write anything because you are worried about someone else, as is the case with social networking services.
With this app, you can freely write your true feelings about what made you happy, what made you dissatisfied, what made you worried, and what made you happy.

■ Colorful and beautiful design
ChatMemo has a colorful and beautiful design for writing memos.
The theme colors are abundant and include light and dark colors, so you will be able to find the color that you like.

【ChatMemo is recommended for the following people.】
Those who want to take notes casually.
Those who want to tweet about things that are difficult to say on SNS.
Those who want to enjoy their own SNS.
People who want to take notes on their travel or private photos.
descriptionShort: Record notes anytime, anywhere with easy operation! you can take notes as tweet.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for using our app! We have made the following updates this time.

■ Single tag mode is back
In the previous update, we made it possible to select multiple tags, but now it is also possible to select only one tag

■ Minor bug fixes

We look forward to your continued support!

title:
Chat memo. Memo app like tweet
4.2.0
